name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - co-proxamol
title: Co-proxamol cost per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Co-proxamol is a painkiller which was withdrawn in 2005 due to safety concerns.  All marketing authorisations were cancelled at the end of 2007.
There remains some prescribing of co-proxamol (which is now unlicensed) at a cost of over £100 per box.
